title: Could someone explain how the MMR reset for next season works?
body: Even just give me a lazy version of it

replies.body:
K its (current mmr + 1200 mmr)/2 + provisional outcome = placement in the most basic form

Can't be placed higher than plat 1
Shit, I suck so hard at Maths.... But like... Thank you. lol
Just use google, stop being a moron.
you get your border prizes and next season you will start your 10 ranked games and if you were gold win all 10 promos  you will be above gold loss 10 you will be low gold to low silver
